props.Description: Acolytes can become supreme confidants of their deity
props.Name: Acolyte
props.Lore: Serving the gods, no matter which, requires determination of will and a mind that is not deaf to the whispers of the otherwordly.
props.Requirements: $1Deity!=Faithless;Divination Mastery=10;Discipline=5 OR Meditation Mastery=5;Light=5 OR Dark=5 OR Death=10 OR Chaos=10

props.Name: Cleric
props.Lore: Careful study of a deity's history, tenets and divine powers affords Clerics with unique knowledge they use to enforce the will of their god over minds, bodies and souls of all. So well versed are they in religious texts that they often finds secret ways to use them directly much like a wizard uses a spellbook.
props.Requirements: Knowledge=15;Divination Mastery=15;Discipline=10;Light=15 OR Dark=15 OR Death=15

props.Description: The true gods are cruel and ruthless, that's why they are gods.
props.Name: Dark Priest
Red Priest
props.Lore: Having drunk from aphotic chalice of Mother Night and taken in the Allfather's Light, a Twilight Priest possesses a deeper understanding of both. Most of them lose their faith and fall into darkness, but some find certainty in the all-pervading Duality.

props.Name: Priest
props.Lore: Meditating over the essence of a deity afford Priests a unique connection to their god.
props.Requirements: Divination Mastery=20;Meditation=15;Light=15 OR Chaos=15 OR Dark=20 OR Death=20

props.Name: Prophet
props.Lore: Careful study of a deity's history, tenets and divine powers affords Clerics with unique knowledge they use to enforce the will of their god over minds, bodies and souls of all. So well versed are they in religious texts that they often finds secret ways to use them directly much like a wizard uses a spellbook.
props.Requirements: Knowledge=15;Divination Mastery=15;Discipline=10;Light=15 OR Dark=15 OR Death=15

props.Name: Wraith Speaker
props.Lore: To feel the pain of souls long passed, to feel their longing for things they wished and never had, to master the primal fear of the Void that all living possess, to embrace the otherworldly cold - this is what it takes to be a Wraith Speaker.
props.Requirements: Knowledge=15;Divination Mastery=15;Discipline=10;Light=15 OR Dark=15 OR Death=15

props.Name: Inquisitor
props.Lore: Careful study of a deity's history, tenets and divine powers affords Clerics with unique knowledge they use to enforce the will of their god over minds, bodies and souls of all. So well versed are they in religious texts that they often finds secret ways to use them directly much like a wizard uses a spellbook.
props.Requirements: Knowledge=15;Divination Mastery=15;Discipline=10;Light=15 OR Dark=15 OR Death=15

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Hermit
props.Lore: Life in the wilderness teaches one many things - from practical to spiritual. Not all Hermits pass those challenges - many succumb to hunger, others to madness... But those who find their path attain greater harmony and oneness with Nature than any who call themselves ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEcivilizedASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE.
props.Requirements: Divination Mastery=5 OR Spellcraft=5;Meditation=5;Life=5 OR Chaos=10 OR Death 10 OR Darkness 10

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Shaman

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Shapeshifter

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Earth Caller

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Storm Caller

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Spirit Shaman

props.Description: Monks make their faith into a weapon, using it to steel their bodies and minds. They are versatile and deadly light-weight fighters with considerable potential for Divine spellcasting.
props.Name: Monk
Heretic
props.Lore: Meditating over the essence of a deity afford Priests a unique connection to their god.
props.Requirements: Divination Mastery=20;Meditation=15;Light=15 OR Chaos=15 OR Dark=20 OR Death=20

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Spirit Walker

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Caller of Elements

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Flame Speaker

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Deep One

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Lord of Bones

props.Description: Hermits can become take advantage of the powers of animals, plants and elements as Druids or combine their wild lore with that of primordial Chaos and become the harbingers of Dissolution as Shamans.
props.Name: Cultist
props.Lore: Life in the wilderness teaches one many things - from practical to spiritual. Not all Hermits pass those challenges - many succumb to hunger, others to madness... But those who find their path attain greater harmony and oneness with Nature than any who call themselves ASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEcivilizedASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSE.
props.Requirements: Chaos=15 OR Total Chaos, Death, Dark 30;Divination Mastery=10;Spellcraft=10;

props.Description: Bonus to Endurance, Strength and all Elemental Resistances. Increases Spellpower by 10% of Base Strength.
props.Name: Battle Mage
props.Requirements: Any Weapon=15 OR Armorer=10; Any Body =15 OR Any Offense =15 OR Any Defense =15;Discipline=10;Wizardry=15;Any Magic 15;Spellcraft 15;

props.Name: Magus
props.Lore: To walk the middle path between studious precision and passion for discovery and arcane insight is something that few manage to achieve. Those who do are without doubt the most blessed of all magic learners, envied by the outcast apostates and every diligent studiosus alike.

props.Name: Omnimagus
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Shadow Mastery(5);Witchery Mastery(5);Celestial Mastery(5);Sorcery Mastery(5);Conjuration Mastery(5);Destruction Mastery(5);Elemental Mastery(5);Blood Magic Mastery(5);Benediction Mastery(5);Sylvan Mastery(5);Demonology Mastery(5);Affliction Mastery(5);Necromancy Mastery(5);Warp Mastery(5);Savage Mastery(5);Psychic Mastery(5);Redemption Mastery(5)

props.Flavor: I've have enough of spoon-feeding teachers. It's time I take charge of my magic.
props.Description: Those walk the path of Apostate will have higher Intelligence and Spellpower but less Knowledge and Wisdom. They will usually rely on a small but flexible pool of high-level Memorized spells, further enhanced by Spellcraft skills. Witch King is the most common deity of Apostates, as he makes their magic nearly irresistible.
props.Name: Apostate
props.Lore: If you know what you want and have the will to achieve it, you don't need mentors and you certainly don't need to stay with the herd. - "Sorcery and Might" by Archibald Denourd
props.Requirements: Spellcraft=10;Death 10 or Chaos 9 or Dark 8 or Arcane 7 or Total Death, Chaos, Dark, Arcane, Elemental 15
props.Group: Spellcraft=10;Any Magic=10 OR Arcane 5 OR Dark 5 OR Chaos 5 OR Death 5;Principles=Freedom OR Principles=Ambition

props.Description: Fire and Shadows stand at Warlock's command
props.Name: Warlock
props.Lore: Those few Cultists not consumed by madness, possessed by demons or incinerated through their own rituals, may rise to actually command the sinister powers they pledged themselves to, though their soul are only likely to go deeper into abyss of ruthlessness and malice.

props.Name: Witchmaster
props.Lore: There is a method to this madness - even voodoo magic has its pathways to Mastery, though reason often has little to do with it. It is said that to become a Witchmaster one must have a truly black heart and wicked soul, a mind full of treachery, and judging by the arts and methods of the infamous Witchmasters, this may well be true. Yet somehow, a few of their number find their way into service to the goodly folk of the Golden Empire and even Allkingdom of the West,

props.Name: Necromancer
props.Lore: Ever the haunted, ever the hunted

props.Description: Additional art is required to have an alternative way to control the fiends
props.Name: Demonologist
props.Lore: The will of a Demonologist must be adamant when dealing with fiends lesser than himself, and his supplication complete when daring to call on the greater lords of the Nether Realms... and at the same time, he may never trust in this semblance of order, for Chaos lies at the heart of each creature touched by the Warp that is stuff and essence of Netherium.
props.Requirements: Spellcraft=25;Demonology=25;Warp=10 OR Blood Magic=10 OR Wizardry=15;

props.Name: Psionicist
props.Lore: Often already mad themselves by the time, some Adepts master the true and full intricacy of the mind-soul mystery, the interrelation between Warp and Aether, if not the and the enigmatic role of the Void,

props.Name: Blood Mage
props.Lore: The will of a Demonologist must be adamant when dealing with fiends lesser than himself, and his supplication complete when daring to call on the greater lords of the Nether Realms... and at the same time, he may never trust in this semblance of order, for Chaos lies at the heart of each creature touched by the Warp that is stuff and essence of Netherium.

props.Name: Arcane Adept
props.Requirements: Spellcraft=20;Total Arcane 20 or Total Sorcery, Elemental 20

props.Name: Wizard Apprentice
props.Lore: I shall leave no mystery unquestioned, no book unread, no spell forgotten. - Studiosus Oath, Collegium Arcanum.
props.Requirements: Wizardry=10;Any Magic=10 OR Arcane 5 OR Elemental Mastery=5 OR Spellcraft 10

props.Description: Wizards possess very high Knowledge and high Intelligence but moderate Spellpower and rely on an ever growing repertoire of spells they learned En Verbatim, making them very useful and versatile in long engagements where different kinds of dangers must be overcome.
props.Name: Wizard
props.Requirements: Wizardry=20;Any Magic 15 or Arcane 12 or Total Magic 25;

props.Name: Red Wizard
props.Lore: Rebellious group that was Lower Underworld where the earth is hot with the pulsating energies of the Core, learning from Red Dragons, using Chaos Crystals to channel powerful spells

props.Name: Dark Wizard
props.Lore: Precise and methodical study of the Dark Arts is not an easy thing to accomplish - in most of the civilized world it is strictly forbidden or monitored, and elsewhere in the wild one can scarcely expect the stability required for deep enough research.

props.Description: Arcanists make their vast Knowledge into a fearsome weapon. It is said they have found a link between the Theory of Arcane and the mystery of Spellpower...
props.Name: Arcanist
props.Lore: You've been reading books your whole life, maybe it's time to write a few?

props.Description: Arcanists make their vast Knowledge into a fearsome weapon. It is said they have found a link between the Theory of Arcane and the mystery of Spellpower...
props.Name: Cybermancer
props.Lore: If you are elderly and you've been reading books your whole life, it might be time to write a few...

props.Description: Fire and Shadows stand at Warlock's command
props.Name: Shadow Warlock
props.Lore: Those few Cultists not consumed by madness, possessed by demons or incinerated through their own rituals, may rise to actually command the sinister powers they pledged themselves to, though their soul are only likely to go deeper into abyss of ruthlessness and malice.

props.Description: Fire and Shadows stand at Warlock's command
props.Name: Arch-Warlock
props.Lore: Those few Cultists not consumed by madness, possessed by demons or incinerated through their own rituals, may rise to actually command the sinister powers they pledged themselves to, though their soul are only likely to go deeper into abyss of ruthlessness and malice.

props.Description: Shadow and Flame stand at Warlock's command
props.Name: Brimstone Warlock
props.Lore: Those few Cultists not consumed by madness, possessed by demons or incinerated through their own rituals, may rise to actually command the sinister powers they pledged themselves to, though their soul are only likely to go deeper into abyss of ruthlessness and malice.

props.Name: Witch Blade
props.Requirements: Blade=15;Stealth 10 OR Throwing Mastery 10;Dark 15 OR Arcane 20 OR Chaos 20 OR Death 20;

props.Dev_Notes: Tricksters can outmaneuver, distract and surprise their enemies. They can grow to become deadly Assassin to strike down enemies from the shadows or spectacular War Dancers who can engage and outsmart entire squadrons of enemies. Turn action of a round is free (including cooldown). Art of Maneuver: Move Back, Right and Left and all Turn actions cost {1}% less Action Points, all movement actions cost {2}% less Stamina.
props.Description: [Art of Trickery]: Gains {1}% bonus when making Reaction and Quick Wit rolls (save and beat), receives bonus Defense from Intelligence ({2}%)
props.Name: Trickster
props.Lore: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Requirements: Total Mobility, Intelligence, Tactics, Stealth Mastery=18;Total Item Mastery, Blade, Polearm=10;
props.Rank: Mobility 10;Stealth Mastery=5 OR Intelligence=8;Throw Mastery=5 OR Blade=5 OR Polearm 10;
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Defense({Intelligence}*{2}/100);Reaction Roll Save Bonus({1});Reaction Roll Beat Bonus({1});Quick Wit Roll Save Bonus({1});Quick Wit Roll Beat Bonus({1});

props.Description: Trick of treat?
props.Name: Thief

props.Description: Art of Maneuver: Move and Turn actions cost {1}% less Action Points and {2}% less Stamina.
props.Name: Acrobat

props.Description: Some thieves end up stealing lives more than gold. They are usually well compensated for the inconvenience.
props.Name: Assassin
props.Requirements: Blade=25 OR Total Weapon 40;Mobility=20;Stealth=15;Marksmanship=15 OR Item=15 OR Athletics=15

props.Description: Dedication brings roses.
props.Name: Blade Master
props.Requirements: Blade=30;Two handed Combat 20 or Dual Combat=15 or Defense 15;Mobility=15;

props.Description: Receives an improved version of Whirlwind attack that deals 50% more damage.
props.Name: Blade Dancer
props.Lore: Acrobatics are more effective when done with blade in hand.

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Hunter
Spy
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Behind Sight Range({1});Sneak Protection({2});Ranged Sneak Mod({3})

props.Description: Receives an improved version of Whirlwind attack that costs only half as much Stamina and Action Points and doesn't reduce Focus.
props.Name: War Dancer
props.Lore: Acrobatics are also quite effective when done with a war staff or spear in hand.

props.Flavor: Anyone with minimal weapons skills and enough mobility to compensate the lack of armor can proudly proclaim himself a Rogue and enjoy the additional Agility that comes with it.
props.Description: [Improvised Attacks]: attacking in melee, denies Critical Damage Reduction and {1}% of Defense unless Watched by the target.
props.Name: Rogue
props.Lore: Rogues can become effective killers as Cutthroats or make themselves into intolerable nuisance as Swashbucklers. Anyone with minimal weapons skills and enough mobility to compensate the lack of armor can proudly proclaim himself a Rogue and enjoy the additional Agility that comes with it.
props.Requirements: Blade=10 or Total Weapon 15;Total Dual Wielding, Mobility, Defense 12 or Total Stealth Mastery, Item Mastery 12;

props.Description: [Dispassionate Killer]: No morale loss from fallen allies, attacks against incapacitated targets restore {1} Initiative and half as much Focus.
props.Name: Thug
props.Lore: If there is dirty work to be done, and you have no money for an assassin, hire a pair of thugs. Same result, just a lot messier.
props.Requirements: Blade=20 or Total Weapon 25;Offense 15 or Total Offense 20;Mobility=10;

props.Description: [Dazing Bluster]: In melee, {1}% of heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Charisma is added as bonus or penalty to heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs or targetASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Defense. [Bravado] {1}% of heroASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs Morale is addded to their Initiative.
props.Name: Swashbuckler
props.Lore: It takes more than bravado and lack of good sense to swash a buckler well, it takes charisma and dedication to chaos.
props.Requirements: Blade=15;Mobility=15;Total Defense, Dual Wielding, Item, Unarmed 20;

props.Description: You don't mess with such people.
props.Name: Cutthroat
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Blunt Mastery(5);Blade Mastery(5);Axe Mastery(5);Two Handed Mastery(5)

props.Description: Charisma brings wealth.
props.Name: Pirate

props.Description: Ranged penalties incurred by Vision (non-Plain Sight targets) is reduced by {1}%.
props.Name: Scout
props.Lore: War is often won not by better arms or greater numbers, but by superior strategy and tactic, that is, by information and swift decisive actions. Scouts are adept at procuring the former and also excel in the latter, striking from a distance and on the move, often from cover, leaving their enemies at a disadvantage. They can become expert archers as Snipers or combine their marksmanship skills with those of survivability and detection as Rangers.

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Ranger
props.Requirements: Detection Mastery=10;Stealth Mastery=5;Mobility=10;Athletics=10 OR Any Weapon 10;Marksmanship=10;

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Sniper

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Ballestero

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Beastmaster

props.Description: If there is dirty work to be done, and you have no money for an assassin, hire a pair of thugs. Same result, just a lot messier.
props.Name: Executioner

props.Description: You don't mess with such people.
props.Name: Raider
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Blunt Mastery(5);Blade Mastery(5);Axe Mastery(5);Two Handed Mastery(5)

props.Description: Tricksters can outmaneuver, distract and surprise their enemies. They can grow to become deadly Assassin to strike down enemies from the shadows or spectacular War Dancers who can engage and outsmart entire squadrons of enemies.
props.Name: Poisoner
props.Lore: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Requirements: Total Stealth Mastery, Mobility, Tactics, Intelligence=35;Total Item Mastery, Polearm, Blade=25
props.Rank: Intelligence=12 OR Stealth Mastery=10;Mobility=15;Throw Mastery=10;Polearm 15 OR Blade 10;Principles=Treachery OR Principles=Freedom

props.Description: Drains {1} Focus from attackers upon dodging a melee attack.
props.Name: Shadow Dancer

props.Description: Catch me if you can.
props.Name: Death Dancer

props.Description: +1 behind sight
props.Name: Sabateur

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Bowman

props.Description: Scouts can become expert archers as Snipers or combine their marksmanship skills with those of survivability and detection as Rangers.
props.Name: Adventurer
props.Lore: War is often won not by better arms or greater numbers, but by superior strategy and tactic, that is, by information and swift decisive actions. Scouts are adept at procuring the former and also excel in the latter, striking from a distance and on the move, often from cover, leaving their enemies at a disadvantage.

props.Description: [Marksmanship]:
props.Name: Marksman
props.Lore: War is often won not by better arms or greater numbers, but by superior strategy and tactic, that is, by information and swift decisive actions. Scouts are adept at procuring the former and also excel in the latter, striking from a distance and on the move, often from cover, leaving their enemies at a disadvantage.

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Rifleman

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Eldritch Archer

props.Description: Every other melee attack may use extra attack points instead of Action Points
props.Name: Duelist
props.Lore: Having drunk away their glory and whatever rewards were ever won in swordsman contests, these former Duelists take it up to hunt apostates for coin, a job that, suprisingly, requires a fair measure of wit and reflexes to match the speed of a hurled fireball... But most of all, it requires the contempt and indifference that only years of wasting oneASCII_OPEN65533ASCII_CLOSEs life on ale and women can bring.

props.Description: Trick of treat?
props.Name: Swindler

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Pathfinder

props.Description: Scouts can become expert archers as Snipers or combine their marksmanship skills with those of survivability and detection as Rangers.
props.Name: Landstrider
props.Lore: War is often won not by better arms or greater numbers, but by superior strategy and tactic, that is, by information and swift decisive actions. Scouts are adept at procuring the former and also excel in the latter, striking from a distance and on the move, often from cover, leaving their enemies at a disadvantage.

props.Description: Receives a bonus to Attack value for all ranged attacks equal to the amount of Detection minus target's Stealth (cannot become negative).
props.Name: Tracker

props.Description: Certain aptitude for mischief, sharp wits and good mobility are all required to become a Trickster. It's a tricky business.
props.Name: Trapper

props.Description: Some thieves end up stealing lives more than gold. They are usually well compensated for the inconvenience.
props.Name: Death Dealer
props.Requirements: Blade=25 OR Total Weapon 40;Mobility=20;Stealth=15;Marksmanship=15 OR Item=15 OR Athletics=15

props.Description: If there is dirty work to be done, and you have no money for an assassin, hire a pair of thugs. Same result, just a lot messier.
props.Name: Blackguard

props.Description: It takes more than bravado and lack of good sense to swash a buckler well, it takes charisma and dedication to chaos.
props.Name: Witch Hunter
props.Lore: Vegabonds and scoundrels

props.Description: It takes more than bravado and lack of good sense to swash a buckler well, it takes charisma and dedication to chaos.
props.Name: Spell Blade
props.Lore: Vegabonds and scoundrels

props.Description: Trick of treat?
props.Name: Stalker

props.Description: Trick of treat?
props.Name: Shadow Walker

props.Description: Charisma brings wealth.
props.Name: Black Captain

props.Description: Charisma brings wealth.
props.Name: Golden Captain

props.Description: Charisma brings wealth.
props.Name: Iron Captain

props.Description: [Opportunist]: Attacks of Opportunity are made against non-Instant spells and receive Sneak bonuses.
props.Name: Opportunist
props.Lore: It takes more than bravado and lack of good sense to swash a buckler well, it takes charisma and dedication to chaos.

props.Description: Pirates contantly seek to hire the most brutal warriors to ensure their victory against whatever guards stand between them and their plunder. Often the hirelings eventually replace dead captains, and such crews are the most vicious, sacking whole settlements for the sake of glory as well as riches...
props.Name: Reaver
Templar
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.

props.Name: Paladin
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.
props.Requirements: Divination 20;Light 25;Any Weapon 20;Any Defense 25 or Discipline 25;Tactics 25 OR Leadership 20;

props.Name: Anti-Paladin
props.Lore: For all the blood and tears, now with wrath and terrible vengeance upon the self-righteous and the ignorant fools who know nothing. This is the only true justice.
props.Requirements: Dark 25 OR Chaos 25 OR Death 25;Any Weapon 25;Divination 20;Any Offense 25;

props.Description: [Just Cause]: Counter Attack points multiplied by {1}. [Code of Honor]: Sneak attacks deal {3}% less damage and reduce morale by {2} each time.
props.Name: Knight
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.
props.Requirements: Total Blade, Polearm 25 OR Any Weapon 20, Total Tactics, Leadership 20, Total Armorer, Shield Mastery 20, Total Discipline, Defense Mastery 20
props.Rank: Armorer=15;Blade=15;Polearm=10;Discipline=15;Shield Mastery 10 OR Defense Mastery=10;Principles=Charity OR Principles=Law OR Principles=Honor;

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Grey Knight

props.Description: Gains morale whenever an ally strikes at enemy within 2 cells radius and initiative whenever they are struck.
props.Name: Squire
props.Requirements: Total Blade, Polearm 12 OR Total Weapon 18, Total Tactics, Leadership 10, Total Armorer, Shield Mastery 10, Total Discipline, Defense Mastery 10

props.Name: Knight Captain
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.
props.Requirements: Tactics 20 OR Leadership 15;Armorer=15;Blade=15;Polearm=10;Discipline=15;Shield Mastery 10 OR Defense Mastery=10;

props.Description: [Quick Rearm]: All Item Actions cost {1}% less Action Points. Use Inventory does not prompt Attacks of Opportunity. [Henchman]: +{2} to all weapon mastery scores
props.Name: Man-at-Arms
props.Lore: Not all men are born to be heroes and knights. Some just have to be good fighters.
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Any Defense 15 OR Body 15 OR Any Offense 15;
props.Passives: ActionModProp(Use Inventory, [remove]Action Tags(Attack Of Opportunity));ParamBonus(Weapon Masteries, {2});

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Dark Knight
props.Requirements: Armorer=25;Blade=25 OR Polearm=30;Discipline=25;Defense Mastery=25;Dark 20 or Death 20 or Chaos 20

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: White Knight

props.Description: Not all men are born to be heroes and knights. Some just have to be good fighters.
props.Name: Master At Arms
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Any Defense 15 OR Body 15 OR Any Offense 15;

props.Description: Not all men are born to be heroes and knights. Some just have to be good fighters.
props.Name: Houseguard Captain
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Any Defense 15 OR Body 15 OR Any Offense 15;

props.Name: Champion
props.Lore: Long years of exceptional service in the absence of crippling injuries produce soldiers of supreme prowess, a mind for cunning and a spirit to follow in the heat of battle. In the King's Legions, Champions are valued and every soldier dreams to see himself one day at this finest moment, gleaming bright in the glory and honor, one of the brotherhood of the leaders.

props.Name: Berserker
props.Lore: In the far North, they can teach a strong enough warrior how to awaken the Inner Beast, true nature of the Primordial Men, as when they were first created by the Allfather's sons, the Titans. With that power, a warrior can become an unstoppable killing machine.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Two Handed Mastery(12);Dual Wielding Mastery(12);Athletics Mastery(6)

props.Description: [Die Standing]: Recovers from being unconscious with {1} less Focus and has {2}% greater chance to resist Knockdown from Force effects.
props.Name: Fighter
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 10;Body=10 OR Any Offense=10 OR Any Defense=10 Or Total Weapon, Body, Offense, Defense 24
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Focus Recover Req(-{1});Force Roll Save Bonus({2});

props.Flavor: Warriors don't have much time - or need - for defense.
props.Description: Gains {1} Morale when landing and Initiative when taking a hit.
props.Name: Warrior
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Total Body 15;Any Offense 10;

props.Description: Soldiers know better than anyone that war is ten percent fighting and ninety percent marching. Makes them natural athletes with more discipline.
props.Name: Soldier

props.Description: Soldiers know better than anyone that war is ten percent fighting and ninety percent marching. Makes them natural athletes with more discipline.
props.Name: Veteran
props.Lore: Elite troops

props.Name: Weapon Master
props.Lore: In the far North, they can teach a strong enough warrior how to awaken the Inner Beast, true nature of the Primordial Men, as when they were first created by the Allfather's sons, the Titans. With that power, a warrior can become an unstoppable killing machine.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Two Handed Mastery(12);Dual Wielding Mastery(12);Athletics Mastery(6)

props.Name: Slayer
props.Lore: In the far North, they can teach a strong enough warrior how to awaken the Inner Beast, true nature of the Primordial Men, as when they were first created by the Allfather's sons, the Titans. With that power, a warrior can become an unstoppable killing machine.
props.Parameter_Bonuses: Two Handed Mastery(12);Dual Wielding Mastery(12);Athletics Mastery(6)

props.Name: Commander
props.Requirements: Total Blade, Polearm, Armorer, Discipline, Shield, Defense Mastery, Tactics, Leadership=25

props.Description: [Rallying Presence] Leadership and Tactics scores are increased by {1}%
props.Name: Officer
props.Requirements: Total Tactics, Leadership 30, Discipline 15, Total Weapon 25 or Any Weapon 15, Total Defense Mastery, Armorer, Shield Mastery 20

props.Name: Lord-Commander
props.Requirements: Total Blade, Polearm, Armorer, Discipline, Shield, Defense Mastery, Tactics, Leadership=25

props.Description: Warriors don't have much time - or need - for defense.
props.Name: Gladiator
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Total Body 15;Any Offense 10;

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Chaos Knight

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Death Knight

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Black Knight
Void Templar
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Knight Champion

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Knight Protector

props.Description: Bleak seem now the ideals your fought for and the world is not as simple as it seemed. But you have found your place nonetheless, between shadow and light, in the grey of twilight. Let the zealots clash with one another all they like.
props.Name: Knight Errand

props.Description: Warriors don't have much time - or need - for defense.
props.Name: Glory Seeker
props.Requirements: Any Weapon 20 or Total Weapon 30;Total Body 15;Any Offense 10;

props.Description: Soldiers know better than anyone that war is ten percent fighting and ninety percent marching. Makes them natural athletes with more discipline.
props.Name: Battlemaster
Witch Slayer
props.Lore: Long years of exceptional service and absence of crippling injuries produce soldiers of supreme prowess as well as cunning, a mind for cunning and a spirit to follow in the heat of battle. In the King's Legions, Champions are valued and every soldier dreams to see himself one day at this finest moment, gleaming bright in the glory and honor, one of the brotherhood of the leaders.

props.Name: Paragon
props.Lore: Long years of exceptional service and absence of crippling injuries produce soldiers of supreme prowess as well as cunning, a mind for cunning and a spirit to follow in the heat of battle. In the King's Legions, Champions are valued and every soldier dreams to see himself one day at this finest moment, gleaming bright in the glory and honor, one of the brotherhood of the leaders.

props.Name: Twilight Templar
props.Lore: High is the price of Knighthood, in blood and tears, but the person it makes is much more than a just fighter. A Knight knows how to sacrifice, how to serve and how to command, he is slave to no one but his honor. He is more disciplined than any Warrior and more strong of will than simple Soldier.
props.Requirements: Divination 20;Light 25;Any Weapon 20;Any Defense 25 or Discipline 25;Tactics 25 OR Leadership 20;

props.Description: Bonus to all Astral Resistances, Strength from Spellpower, Agility from Resistance Penetration
props.Name: Eldritch Warrior
props.Requirements: Spellcraft=20;Arcane=20 OR Dark=25;Blade=20 OR Any Weapon=25
